title: Chocolate Fudge
description: Rich and creamy chocolate fudge made with just three simple ingredients - perfect for gifting or indulging.
instructions: Line an 8x8 inch pan with parchment paper, leaving overhang for easy removal.
In a heavy-bottomed saucepan, combine chocolate chips and condensed milk over low heat.
Stir constantly until chocolate is completely melted and mixture is smooth (about 5-7 minutes).
Remove from heat and stir in vanilla extract until well combined.
Pour mixture into prepared pan and spread evenly.
Refrigerate for at least 2 hours or until completely set.
Using parchment overhang, lift fudge from pan and cut into squares.
Store in airtight container in refrigerator.
tips: Use low heat to prevent chocolate from seizing or burning
Stir constantly for smooth, even melting
Line pan well for easy removal and clean cuts
